# insert(_:after:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts the provided section snapshot immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func insert(_ snapshot: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshot<ItemIdentifierType>, after item: ItemIdentifierType)
```

## Inserting items

- **insert(_:after:)**: Inserts the provided items immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.
- **insert(_:before:)**: Inserts the provided items immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.
- **insert(_:before:)**: Inserts the provided section snapshot immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.
